src:
Sejauh Ini Turis Malaysia Paling Sering Liburan ke Indonesia
01 Nov 2019, 14:25 by Johanes Randy Prakoso


Ilustrasi bendera Malaysia (AFP PHOTO)

Jakarta - Selama bulan September 2019 kemarin, Indonesia dikunjungi 1,4 juta turis. Mayoritas masih datang dari Malaysia.Hal itu terungkap dalam data terbaru yang dirilis Badan Pusat Statistik (BPS), Jumat ini (1/11/2019). Dari 1,4 juta wisman yang datang ke Indonesia, paling banyak berasal dari negara Malaysia sebesar 233,8 ribu kunjungan (17 persen).Di peringkat kedua disusul oleh turis China sebanyak 173,1 ribu atau 12%. Kemudian di peringkat ketiga ada Singapura dengan 159,5 ribu atau 11%.Sisanya ada turis Australia sebanyak 138,6 ribu (10%), Timor Leste sebanyak 100,3 ribu (7%) dan lainnya sebanyak 595 ribu atau 43%.Adapun apabila dibandingkan dengan bulan Agustus 2019 lalu, sejumlah turis dari negara Afrika Selatan, Meksiko dan Rusia mengalami kenaikan. Sedangkan turis dari UAE, Arab Saudi dan Kuwait mengalami penurunan.Sedangkan menurut kawasan, selama bulan Januari hingga September 2019 Indonesia banyak dikunjungi turis dari negara Asean sebanyak 4,720,9 juta. Tahun ini jumlahnya pun meningkat sebanyak 17,54% ketimbang periode yang sama dari bulan Januari hingga September tahun 2018 lalu.Simak Video "Asik! Aturan Tax Refund Segera Berlaku Untuk Turis"[Gambas:Video 20detik](rdy/rdy)
text:
By far the most frequent Malaysian tourist vacation to Indonesia
Nov 01 2019, 14:25 by Johanes Randy Prakoso


Illustration of Malaysian flag (AFP PHOTO)

Jakarta - During September 2019 yesterday, Indonesia was visited by 1.4 million tourists. The majority still come from Malaysia. It was revealed in the latest data released by the Central Statistics Agency (BPS), this Friday (11/01/2019). Of the 1.4 million foreign tourists who came to Indonesia, most came from Malaysia totaling 233.8 thousand visits (17 percent). In the second place followed by Chinese tourists as much as 173.1 thousand or 12%. Then in third place is Singapore with 159.5 thousand or 11%. The rest there are Australian tourists as much as 138.6 thousand (10%), Timor Leste as much as 100.3 thousand (7%) and others as much as 595 thousand or 43%. when compared to last August 2019, a number of tourists from South African countries, Mexico and Russia have increased. While tourists from the UAE, Saudi Arabia and Kuwait experienced a decline. Meanwhile according to the region, during January to September 2019 Indonesia was visited by tourists from Asean countries as much as 4,720.9 million. This year the number also increased by 17.54% compared to the same period from January to September 2018. Watch the Video "Cool! Tax Refund Rules Immediately Apply to Tourists" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (rdy / rdy)
